original_text: Meanwhile, Horam king of Gezer had come up to help Lachish, but Joshua defeated him and his army—until no survivors were left.
korean_text: 그 때에 게셀 왕 호람이 라기스를 도우려고 올라오므로 여호수아가 그와 그의 백성을 쳐서 한 사람도 남기지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Meanwhile, Horam king of Gezer had come up to help Lachish
sentences.korean_translation: 그동안 게셀 왕 호람은 라기스를 돕기 위해 올라왔지만

sentences.original_text: but Joshua defeated him and his army
